credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Sabre-shaped blade, engraved and gilded on both sides with a cartouche of eagle's head and initial "W." Plain bolster and brass (?) ferrule, both gilded. Tapering handle, round in section, of white milk glass with gold Chinoiserie design in gold. Figure with parasol in front of table with vase of flowers set in landscape, trees and pagoda/house.
name: Knife
